snippet.title: Back to earth for rooftop priest
snippet.description:
London / 9 July 2006
… the high points had been the tremendous support from people at ground level, which had helped him cope with the isolation of being on the roof.

snippet.title: Flood cuts power to 2,500 homes
snippet.description:
North Yorkshire / 20 June 2005
Yorkshire and Wales scoured the area and rescued people from cars, trees and the roofs of isolated homes. One elderly woman who had suffered…
